paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Leu68Ile, including penetrance data from two case reports.

patients.phenotype: cardiac ATTR confirmed by RV cardiac biopsy

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with cardiac ATTR, confirmed by RV cardiac biopsy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 68-year-old woman was diagnosed as having cardiac ATTR, confirmed by RV cardiac biopsy in 2013.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The patient was treated with TAFAMIDIS due to neurological complications.
key_quotes: Genetic testing was positive, with an ATTR Leu68Ile mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
